buffer-0.0.1: Fast, packed, UTF-8 finger treesContentsIndex
buffer-0.0.1: Fast, packed, UTF-8 finger trees
A time and space-efficient implementation of byte vectors using packed Word8 arrays, suitable for high performance use, both in terms of large data quantities, or high speed requirements. Based on Data.ByteString and Data.FingerTree with minor additions to track the number of (potential) UTF8 multibyte tail bytes present in each given fragment and to break up fragments that include too many tail bytes to improve the asymptotics of splitting.
